level.text: A foster parent shall ensure that all vehicles used to transport foster children are maintained in a safe condition and in compliance with all applicable motor vehicle laws.
A foster parent shall provide and use child restraint seats or seat belts, as appropriate to the foster child’s age, in all vehicles.

Any vehicle in which a foster child may be a passenger or driver shall have comprehensive liability and personal injury insurance that provides coverage in the event of personal or property injury arising from the operation of the vehicle.
A foster parent shall allow a foster child to be transported only by responsible persons who possess valid driver’s licenses.
